# ActorExecutionStatus enumeration

The execution status of an actor.

The execution status of an actor.

```csharp
public enum ActorExecutionStatus
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0` | No status is available. |
| Active | `1` | The actor is active. |
| Halting | `2` | The actor is halting. |
| Halted | `3` | The actor is halted. |
